title: Game Progress Route
content:
it seems none of you can be trusted. You, Orin, Ketheric. I will defeat Orin and we shall be allies. You have my oath. I'll think about it. No promises. To the hells with your pact. [INSIGHT] Examine Gortash's body language and expressions. Can you trust him? [DETECT THOUGHTS] Probe Gortash's mind.

Attempting the Insight check will require you to pass a DC of 15. It will be revealed that he has the full intention of sharing the kingdom with you. Then, you will have the following options to resp
